data.name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Missions
data.detailed_description:
Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma points to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner if you know where to find a job. From collecting nanite samples from infected sites, freeing hostages and defusing bombs to defending against invading headcases, corp troops or crazed technomancers, a wealth of repeatable mission will keep you on your toes.

The MISSIONS pack provides veteran Shadowrunners with replayable missions for single or co-op gameplay. All missions will feature variable enemies, target positions and other elements to keep replay fresh and offer you hours of challenging gameplay.

You also gain an extra slot to create a new character build and try out new combinations!

The missions will appear on the world map after you have finished the Lockdown Campaign and refresh in regular intervals.

This update works for both Shadowrun Chronicles and Shadowrun Chronicles: INFECTED! Director's Cut.

data.short_description: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 + (doesnt work on 10.13 High Sierra and higher)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GH or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 + (doesnt work on 10.13 High Sierra and higher)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card with dedicated drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card with dedicated drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
